about_the_game:
Nordic Racing

Nordic Racing is an exhilarating open-world driving adventure set in the stunning landscapes of the Nordic region. Experience the thrill of the road as you explore diverse maps, from icy fjords and dense forests to bustling cities and serene countryside. Choose from a wide array of vehicles, each with unique handling and customization options. Whether you're navigating treacherous mountain paths or speeding down coastal highways, Nordic Racing offers an unparalleled driving experience.

Key Features

Open-World Exploration: Roam freely across expansive, meticulously detailed maps inspired by the natural beauty and urban landscapes of the Nordic countries.
Diverse Vehicles: Drive a variety of vehicles, including sports cars, SUVs, trucks, and even off-road vehicles.
Realistic Physics and Graphics: Enjoy lifelike vehicle physics and breathtaking graphics that bring the Nordic environment to life.
Endless Fun: Play each map with varying vehicles. Replayability is the key.

name: Nordic Racing

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: win 10
  • Processor: i5, ryzen 5
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: rx 6600, rtx 2060
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: win 10
  • Processor: i5, ryzen 5
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: rx 6600, rtx 2060
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

Experience the thrill of the road as you explore diverse maps, from icy fjords and dense forests to bustling cities and serene countryside. Choose from a wide array of vehicles.
